Nightlight:

"I'll go to meet Zero"said Nightlight"But I'll comeback to help you 
and my friends"


Nightlight comeback to base

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Azure The Warrior" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Starstomp:
> In the asteroid mines, when something's not working the way we 
want, we 
> adapt to it. Alright, you will get the wounded inside. I know Zero 
will be 
> repaired probably before everyone else, so if you meet him, send 
him 
> outside.I'll be assisting Windlord against that double-headed freak-
thing. 
> After you're done, I'd like you to get in CR, but I won't mind if 
you come 
> back to help out. I must tell you, though, that at the first sign 
of 
> weakness, I'm personnally taking you to CR.
>
